short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate color palettes from websites instantly. Copy HEX codes or vector SVG for use in any design software.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Palette Picker lets you generate a colour palette of 4-8 colours from any website on the internet! Along with the colour squares - you can copy all the HEX codes to use as you see it. If you're using another creative software - you can also directly copy paste the vectors from the extension!
